Package game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Represents a game.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Adrienne Kwan

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes display and assets

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Calls functionality required in each tick of the game. Also changes states depending on return value of tick().

    • run

      public void run()
      Game.Game loop Tick and render once every 1/60 second;
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • render

      public void render()

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the game by starting a thread. Returns if game is already running.
      Since:
      1.0

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the game. Returns if already stopped.
      Since:
      1.0
